page.title: 16LOWESWATER SHOW EVENTS
page.content: The events included:- fell races; hound trails; horse driving trial; show jumping; stock shows of horses, cows, bulls, goats and sheep; hound and terrier shows; industrial tent displaying exhibits of cakes, flower arranging, puppets, drawing, tapestry, weaving, knitting, butter, painted stones, pictures, walking sticks, minature gardens, cooking, home made wines, patchwork, home made jam, proggie mats, models etc. Local firms attending:- Natwest Bank, National Trust, Live Aid collection, car show. Stalls selling:- fishing gear, wood carvings, fruit, plants, sweets, leather work, crafts. Meals could be bought in the lunch tent and there was also a beer tent. Radio Cumbria made live broadcasts. The secretary's tent was full of poeple running around inside organizing.
